DOC.brief_summary: This is an observation study of women with gestational diabetes. Subjects recruited undergo immediate postpartum diabetic screening prior to discharge. Post-partum screening for overt diabetes is repeated 6-12 weeks postpartum. The outcome of interest is the utility of an immediate post partum screen for overt diabetes compared to a traditional 6 week test.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Glucose Tolerance Testing After Gestational Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy Gestational diabetes Multiple gestations prepregnancy diabetes
